Quest_Name: Every Time You Speak I Just Die

MemoryInfobox.name: Every Time You Speak I Just Die
MemoryInfobox.description: 'A philosopher told of a woman who had been a great admirer of his speeches. She was killed in a soldier raid, and the philosopher planned revenge on the soldiers.'

General_Description: '''Every Time You Speak I Just Die''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A philosopher sought the help of a [[mercenary]]. Kassandra answered.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped the philosopher by killing a military commander.
